mapper.select: SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_location, warehouse_scale, warehouse_manager FROM warehouse ORDER BY warehouse_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO warehouse (warehouse_id, warehouse_location, warehouse_scale, warehouse_manager, warehouse_status, warehouse_current) VALUES (#{warehouseId},#{warehouseLocation},#{warehouseScale},#{warehouseManager}, 's01', 0)
mapper.select: SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_location, warehouse_scale, warehouse_current, (warehouse_scale - warehouse_current) AS conf FROM warehouse WHERE warehouse_status = 's01'
